name: Mountain of Ice
description:
Mountain of Ice

Climb as high as you can!

My first game jam!! It is inspired by Icy Tower game from the old days, with the mechanics to bounce from walls on the sides. 

Controls:

LEFT and RIGHT to move
SPACE to jump

Jump higher with higher speed
Walls will help bounce you higher!

Did not have enough time to add a score GUI counter to know current high that you have climbed
